trigger.title: Trigger: Villager Trade
trigger.description: Triggers after the player trades with a villager or a wandering trader.

conditions.title: Conditions
conditions.description: Object containing conditions that need to be met when the trigger gets activated. The criterion is marked completed when the trigger activates and all conditions passed.

item.title: Item
item.description: The item that was purchased. The 'count' tag checks the count from one trade, not multiple.

anyOf.description: Specifies a list of predicates that must pass in order for the criterion to be granted. The checks are applied to the villager, with the origin being the position of the player that would get the advancement.
Checks the villager the item was purchased from.
